title: Notable & Quotable: Penn State and Castro
sub_head: ‘An émigré from Venezuela, told Campus Reform that he was deeply shocked and disappointed.’
body:
Luca Miraldiwriting for Campus Reform, July 16:

Amid protests in Cuba against the communist regime, Pennsylvania State University is facing scrutiny over a long-displayed wall featuring a quote by Fidel Castro, the country’s former dictator.
On Tuesday, Erik Suarez, a PSU student and former student government deputy director of outreach, tweeted his opposition to the quote. Suarez referred to the display as “propaganda.”
“A few days ago I posted about how my university @penn_state had a wall in a university office area with a Fidel Castro quote.”
